trans-unit.target: Directive: Destroy Corrupted Crystals<tab>A mass of enormous corrupted crystals has been detected near the Moongate Hub. Pilot a vacuum suit, destroy the crystals, and gather the remnants for processing and repurposing.<tab>Destroy large corrupted crystals.<tab>Destroy small corrupted crystals and submit the remnants to the field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Destroy Corrupted Crystals” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

Directive: Clear Toxic Lunar Spongoi<tab>A bed of toxic spongoi has sprouted near the Moongate Hub. Needless to say, the proliferation of these spongoi and their spores would greatly impede the exploration initiative. Pilot a warp loader and clear out the red spongoi.<tab>Clear out the toxic spongoi.<tab>Clear away smaller spongoi using flamethrowers, and submit their ashes to nearby field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Clear Toxic Lunar Spongoi” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.
